reviews.text: "Thanks to its awe-inspiring set pieces and captivating romance, James Cameron’s Titanic remains just as powerful today as it was 25 years ago."
Every time I watch the film it has a new piece or element that makes me fall in love with it even more. It is truly one of the greatest romances seen on film, largely thanks to the performers.
'Titanic' isn’t shy about reaching for the heartstrings, but it’s so well made and acted that it’s impossible to look away from.
